import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"design-systems"}}>{`Design Systems`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"http://styleguides.io/examples.html"}}>{`Style Guides Website`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
{/* TOC */}
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#design-systems"}}>{`Design Systems`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#from-the-podcast"}}>{`From the podcast`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#design-system-links"}}>{`Design System Links`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#carbon-design-system"}}>{`Carbon Design System`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#guidelines"}}>{`Guidelines`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#accessibility"}}>{`Accessibility`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#content"}}>{`Content`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#principles"}}>{`Principles`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#style"}}>{`Style`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#components"}}>{`Components`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#a11y-style-guide"}}>{`A11y Style Guide`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#material-design"}}>{`Material Design`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#colour"}}>{`Colour`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#patterns"}}>{`Patterns`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#growth--communications"}}>{`Growth & communications`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#platforms"}}>{`Platforms`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#viljamisdesigncom"}}>{`viljamisdesign.com`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#atlassian-design"}}>{`Atlassian design`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#dropbox-branding"}}>{`Dropbox Branding`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#government-guidelines"}}>{`Government Guidelines`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#microservices"}}>{`Microservices`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#logging"}}>{`Logging`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#coding"}}>{`Coding`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#concerning-factors"}}>{`Concerning factors`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#workplace-best-practises"}}>{`Workplace Best Practises`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#mathemetic-concepts"}}>{`Mathemetic Concepts`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#inspiration"}}>{`Inspiration`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
{/* /TOC */}
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"from-the-podcast"}}>{`From the podcast`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`IBM Carbon`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Animation - following important preset guidelines or enforcing something flexible to deal with brand identity`}<MDXTag name="ol" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Easing timings`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Bezier curves`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Having a company set structure for their own “Bootstrap” or “Material UI”`}<MDXTag name="ol" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Structure being something that can be documented or readily altered`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"design-system-links"}}>{`Design System Links`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"http://carbondesignsystem.com/"}}>{`Carbon Design System`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"carbon-design-system"}}>{`Carbon Design System`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Consists of a few major sections: `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Guidelines`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Style`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Components`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Resources`}</MDXTag>{` and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Component Status`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"guidelines"}}>{`Guidelines`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"accessibility"}}>{`Accessibility`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Carbon shows emphasis on using the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`tabindex`}</MDXTag>{` correctly and allowing a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Skip to content`}</MDXTag>{` option when there is lengthy navigation so a user may access main content faster.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`An example of a personal, basic implementation can be found over at the `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://www.qantasnewsroom.com.au/"}}>{`blog for Qantas`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"content"}}>{`Content`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Conversation levels for Carbon have been established with examples to portay a tone reflective of the company values. What is the difference between voice and tone? As IBM puts it:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Simply put, we have the same voice all the time, but our tone often changes. Consider this: You have one voice, but you most likely use a certain tone when you are having coffee with friends and a different tone when you are meeting with your boss.`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Tense and sentence structure have continued to haunt me since high school English, but thankfully we now have well thought out and refactored methods and examples to help us out.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"principles"}}>{`Principles`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Be essential`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Be inclusive`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Be consistent`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Be humanistic`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Be delightful`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"style"}}>{`Style`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The style section gives an overview of the standard colours, grids, iconography, typography and motion. Each section provides video examples and even copy options where relavent (colours as an example of a hover that allows you to copy the hex on a click).`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"components"}}>{`Components`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The components section gives examples of implmentation and shows images of the buttons in different states.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"a11y-style-guide"}}>{`A11y Style Guide`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`When it comes to accessibility, your goto reference must be the `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"http://a11y-style-guide.com/style-guide/"}}>{`A11y style guide`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The structure is broken down into the following:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components} props={{"start":0}}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Overview`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Forms`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`General`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Media`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Navigation`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Structure`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Resources`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`For anyone who has had the pleasure of writing forms in HTML, this style guide is worth its weight in gold.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`It also contains more information on implementing `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`skip links`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`One line worth considering in your mantra comes from the base of the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`media`}</MDXTag>{` section: `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Build your media with accessibility in mind! It is much easier to work accessibility into the beginning than trying to tack it on later.`}</MDXTag>{`. Can I get an hallelujah?`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Worthy notes on videos is to offer a transcript or alternative audio track to allow users the option to read or listen to the video.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"material-design"}}>{`Material Design`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://material.io/guidelines/material-design/introduction.html"}}>{`Google's Material Design`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`One of the stronger points of this style guide is coverage of devices and screen sizes it keeps reference too. The `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`motion`}</MDXTag>{` section (a personal favourite) is pletiful with useful gems.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The guide puts an emphasis on `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`larger screens`}</MDXTag>{` vs `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`tablets`}</MDXTag>{` vs `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`wearables`}</MDXTag>{` vs `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`mobile`}</MDXTag>{` devices, something I hadn't even considered prior to reading through their `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`motion`}</MDXTag>{` section.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The choreography section itself has many elegant examples that guide you through their principles in practise - something even someone like myself, a layperson to the great church of animation, can appreciate.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"colour"}}>{`Colour`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Material Design even has an `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://material.io/color/"}}>{`incredible palette available`}</MDXTag>{` to help you with deciding upon colour schemes.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"patterns"}}>{`Patterns`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The section I am most impressed with is the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Patterns`}</MDXTag>{` section. This section itself places an emphasis on employing healthy, regulated design patterns to put into practise.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"growth--communications"}}>{`Growth & communications`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Another section seen sparingly across style guides is a section that details customer-application communications. A simple use case applicable to all application builders is an onboarding process, and explains three onboarding models that are accepted and when and when not to employ a particular model.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"platforms"}}>{`Platforms`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Platforms`}</MDXTag>{` section of this style guide also gives insight to platform adaption.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"viljamisdesigncom"}}>{`viljamisdesign.com`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Viljami Salminen is a Finnish product designer. A personal ode to his own design guidelines `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://viljamisdesign.com/styleguide/"}}>{`viljamisdesign.com`}</MDXTag>{`. Whereas most style guides on this list are highly regulated and continually improved naturally over time through corporate implementation, having a reference to a personally written style guide echoes an individual's mantra. This is both a great way to convey to clients the culmination of your own style and experience.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"atlassian-design"}}>{`Atlassian design`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://atlassian.design/"}}>{`Atlassian design`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Hot off the heels of their new AUD\$10 billion dollar valued office in Sydney CBD and during the beta of their latest iteration of their product line, this is a great chance for you to watch Atlassian push their design practise from staging to production. The guide holds many similiar stables in the concept of writing style and foundations, but a great addition to their guide is a section to inform good practise on `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`presentations`}</MDXTag>{`, a necessary skill if you ever plan on wooing a room full of people.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"dropbox-branding"}}>{`Dropbox Branding`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://www.dropbox.com/branding/"}}>{`Dropbox Brading`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Screenshots and press releases`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Application icons`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"government-guidelines"}}>{`Government Guidelines`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://www.gov.uk/guidance/style-guide"}}>{`UK`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://standards.usa.gov/"}}>{`USA`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"microservices"}}>{`Microservices`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"logging"}}>{`Logging`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://blog.risingstack.com/distributed-tracing-opentracing-node-js/"}}>{`Artcile from Rising Stack`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"coding"}}>{`Coding`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://medium.freecodecamp.org/10-common-data-structures-explained-with-videos-exercises-aaff6c06fb2b"}}>{`Data Structures`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://blog.prototypr.io/10-basic-principles-of-visual-design-55b86b9f7241"}}>{`The Basic Principles of Visual Design`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://medium.com/ux-in-motion/creating-usability-with-motion-the-ux-in-motion-manifesto-a87a4584ddc"}}>{`Creating Usability With Motion`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://12factor.net/"}}>{`12 Steps for Software-as-a-Service apps`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"http://rscss.io/"}}>{`RSCSS`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"concerning-factors"}}>{`Concerning factors`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Keeping processes as stateless `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`processes are stateless and share-nothing`}</MDXTag>{` and require a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`backing service`}</MDXTag>{` to deal with this.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://logmatic.io/blog/beyond-application-monitoring-discover-logging-best-practices/"}}>{`Logging`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://httpstatuses.com/"}}>{`Response status codes`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Network Configuration`}<MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"http://blog.flux7.com/blogs/aws/vpc-best-configuration-practices"}}>{`VPC Best Practises`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Typography`}<MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"http://typographyhandbook.com/"}}>{`Typography Handbook`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
